00034 #include <stdio.h>
00035 #include <math.h>
00036 #include "midas.h"
00037 #include "msystem.h"
00038 /* Select the hardware interface */
00039 #include "camacnul.c"           /* for code debugging no hardware involved */
00040                                                                                                                                                                     /* #include "camacrpc.c" *//* Use Midas frontend driver (FCNA) */
00041                                                                                                                                                                     /* #include "camlinux.c" *//* for the Direct CAMAC from Linux PC box */
00042                                                                                                                                                                     /* #include "ces8210.c"  *//* for the CES8210 VME CAMAC interface */
00043 
00044 #include "esone.c"              /* Declare esone standard (cdreg,cfsa...) */
00045 
00046 #define FRAME_TO_CHANNEL 0
00047 #define CHANNEL_TO_FRAME 1
00048 
00049 #define LRS4032_STR "\
00050 Branch = INT : 0\n\
00051 Crate  = INT : 7\n\
00052 Station  = INT : 1\n\
00053 Mainframe = INT[16] :\n\
00054 [0] 63\n\
00055 [1]  0\n\
00056 [2]  0\n\
00057 [3]  0\n\
00058 [4]  0\n\
00059 [5]  0\n\
00060 [6]  0\n\
00061 [7]  0\n\
00062 [8]  0\n\
00063 [9]  0\n\
00064 [10]  0\n\
00065 [11]  0\n\
00066 [12]  0\n\
00067 [13]  0\n\
00068 [14]  0\n\
00069 [15]  0\n\
00070 "

00072 /*---- globals -----------------------------------------------------*/

00074 /* Specific LRS4032 HV control structure */
00075 struct {
00076    INT branch;
00077    INT crate;
00078    INT station;
00079    INT mainframe[16];
00080    INT ext0;
00081    INT ext1;
00082 } lrs;
00083 
00084 /*---- device driver routines ------------------------------------------------*/
00085 INT lrs4032_init(HNDLE hKeyRoot, INT index, INT channels)
00086 {
00087    INT size, q;
00088    HNDLE hKeyFrame;
00089    HNDLE hDB;
00090    DWORD status;
00091 
00092    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00093 
00094    status = db_create_record(hDB, hKeyRoot, "", LRS4032_STR);
00095    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00096       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs4032_init", "Cannot create BCN_Mainframe\n");
00097       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00098    }
00099    size = sizeof(lrs.branch);
00100    status = db_get_value(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Branch", &lrs.branch, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00101    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00102       cm_msg(MINFO, "lrs4032_init",
00103              "Cannot find 'Branch' entry in ../Devices/LRS4032 database");
00104       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00105    }
00106    status = db_get_value(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Crate", &lrs.crate, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00107    status = db_get_value(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Station", &lrs.station, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00108    size = sizeof(lrs.mainframe);
00109    status = db_find_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Mainframe", &hKeyFrame);
00110    status = db_get_data(hDB, hKeyFrame, &lrs.mainframe[0], &size, TID_INT);
00111 
00112    /* save ext for HV slot */
00113    cdreg(&lrs.ext0, lrs.branch, lrs.crate, lrs.station, 0);
00114    cdreg(&lrs.ext1, lrs.branch, lrs.crate, lrs.station, 1);
00115 
00116    /* initialize device */
00117    cfsa(24, lrs.ext0, &status, &q);
00118    cfsa(24, lrs.ext1, &status, &q);
00119    cfsa(9, lrs.ext0, &status, &q);
00120    return FE_SUCCESS;
00121 }
00122 
00123 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00124 INT lrs4032_exit(INT index)
00125 {
00126    return FE_SUCCESS;
00127 }
00128 
00129 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00130 INT lrs4032_assign_channel(INT direction, INT * channel, INT * frame, INT * chanframe)
00131 {
00132    INT ch;
00133 
00134    ch = *channel;
00135 
00136    switch (direction) {
00137    case FRAME_TO_CHANNEL:
00138       printf("lrs4032_assign_channel: FRAME_TO_CHANNEL not implemented\n");
00139       break;
00140    case CHANNEL_TO_FRAME:
00141       *frame = (ch / 32);
00142       *chanframe = ch - (*frame) * 32;
00143       if (*frame == 0)
00144          *frame = 0x10;
00145 #ifdef DEBUG
00146       printf("%i ->", ch);
00147       printf(" %i %i ", *frame, *chanframe);
00148 #endif
00149       break;
00150    }
00151    return 1;
00152 }
00153 
00154 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00155 INT lrs4032_set(INT index, INT channel, float fvalue)
00156 {
00157    INT frame, fch;
00158    INT nlam, status, q;
00159    INT value;
00160    DWORD dummy, cmd, data;
00161 
00162    value = (INT) fvalue;
00163 
00164    status = 1;
00165 
00166    /* convert channel to frame and channel within frame */
00167    if (lrs4032_assign_channel(CHANNEL_TO_FRAME, &channel, &frame, &fch) < 0)
00168       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00169 
00170    /* compose data word for request */
00171    frame <<= 4;
00172    fch <<= 10;
00173 
00174    /* set command */
00175    cmd = frame | fch | 0x0;
00176 #ifdef DEBUG
00177    printf("WLRS4032:cmd:0x%x n:%i", cmd, lrs.station);
00178 #endif
00179    nlam = q = 0;
00180    {
00181       cfsa(16, lrs.ext0, &cmd, &q);
00182       ss_sleep(100);
00183       if (q == 0)
00184          status++;
00185 
00186       /* Write data */
00187       data = (value << 4) | 0x1;
00188       cfsa(16, lrs.ext0, &data, &q);
00189 
00190 #ifdef DEBUG
00191       printf(" status:%i - value:0x%x - qx:%i ", status, data, q);
00192 #endif
00193       ss_sleep(100);            /* (3000); */
00194       status++;
00195       nlam++;
00196    }
00197 
00198    /* LAM check */
00199    q = nlam = 0;
00200    while (nlam < 100 && q != 1) {
00201       cfsa(27, lrs.ext1, &dummy, &q);
00202       cm_yield(100);            /* check for watchdog requests */
00203       status++;
00204       nlam++;
00205    }
00206 #ifdef DEBUG
00207    printf("st:%i - nlam:%i - q:%i\n", status, nlam, q);
00208 #endif
00209    /* clear LAM */
00210    cfsa(9, lrs.ext0, &dummy, &q);
00211 
00212    return FE_SUCCESS;
00213 }
00214 
00215 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00216 
00217 INT lrs4032_set_all(INT index, INT channels, float value)
00218 {
00219    INT i;
00220 
00221 #ifdef DEBUG
00222    printf("in lrs4032_set_all\n");
00223 #endif
00224    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
00225       lrs4032_set(index, i, value);
00226       cm_yield(0);              /* check for watchdog requests */
00227    }
00228    return FE_SUCCESS;
00229 }
00230 
00231 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00232 
00233 INT lrs4032_get(INT index, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00234 {
00235    INT value;
00236    INT frame, fch;
00237    INT nlam, status, q;
00238    DWORD cmd, dummy, dummi;
00239 
00240    status = 1;
00241    /* convert channel to frame and channel within frame */
00242    if (lrs4032_assign_channel(CHANNEL_TO_FRAME, &channel, &frame, &fch) < 0)
00243       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00244 
00245    /* compose data word for request */
00246    frame <<= 4;
00247    fch <<= 10;
00248 
00249    /* set command */
00250    cmd = frame | fch | 0x3;
00251 #ifdef DEBUG
00252    printf(" RLRS4032:cmd:%x ext:%x %i", cmd, lrs.ext0, lrs.station);
00253 #endif
00254 
00255    cfsa(16, lrs.ext0, &cmd, &q);
00256    ss_sleep(500);
00257    if (q == 0)
00258       status++;
00259 
00260    /* Set LAM check */
00261    nlam = q = 0;
00262    while (nlam < 5 && q != 1) {
00263       cfsa(27, lrs.ext1, &dummy, &q);
00264       ss_sleep(100);
00265       status++;
00266       nlam++;
00267    }
00268 
00269    /* Read value */
00270    value = q = status = 0;
00271    cfsa(2, lrs.ext0, &dummi, &q);
00272    value = dummi;
00273    ss_sleep(200);
00274 
00275    /* LAM check */
00276    q = nlam = 0;
00277    while (nlam < 10 && q != 1) {
00278       cfsa(27, lrs.ext1, &dummy, &q);
00279       ss_sleep(50);
00280       status++;
00281       nlam++;
00282    }
00283 
00284    /* decode value */
00285    value >>= 4;
00286 #ifdef DEBUG
00287    printf(" st:%i - value:%d - q:%i\n", status, value, q);
00288 #endif
00289 
00290    /* clear LAM */
00291    cfsa(9, lrs.ext0, &dummy, &q);
00292    *pvalue = (float) value;
00293    return FE_SUCCESS;
00294 }
00295 
00296 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00297 
00298 INT lrs4032_get_all(INT index, INT channels, float *array)
00299 {
00300    float value;
00301    INT i;
00302 
00303 #ifdef DEBUG
00304    printf("in lrs4032_get_all\n");
00305 #endif
00306 
00307    /* read ALL this equip channels */
00308    for (i = 0; i <= channels; i++) {
00309       lrs4032_get(index, i, &value);
00310       array[i] = value;
00311       cm_yield(0);              /* check for watchdog requests */
00312    }
00313 
00314    return FE_SUCCESS;
00315 }
00316 
00317 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00318 
00319 INT lrs4032(INT cmd, ...)
00320 {
00321    va_list argptr;
00322    HNDLE hKey;
00323    INT index, channel, status;
00324    float value, *pvalue;
00325 
00326    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00327    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00328 
00329    switch (cmd) {
00330    case CMD_INIT:
00331       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00332       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00333       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00334       status = lrs4032_init(hKey, index, channel);
00335       break;
00336 
00337    case CMD_EXIT:
00338       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00339       status = lrs4032_exit(index);
00340       break;
00341 
00342    case CMD_SET:
00343       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00344       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00345       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00346 #ifdef DEBUG
00347       printf("in lrs4032 cmd Set -> :%i -chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, value);
00348 #endif
00349       status = lrs4032_set(index, channel, value);
00350       break;
00351 
00352    case CMD_SET_ALL:
00353       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00354       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00355       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00356 #ifdef DEBUG
00357       printf("in lrs4032 cmd Set all -> :%i -chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, value);
00358 #endif
00359       status = lrs4032_set_all(index, channel, value);
00360       break;
00361 
00362    case CMD_GET:
00363       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00364       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00365       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00366       status = lrs4032_get(index, channel, pvalue);
00367 #ifdef DEBUG
00368       printf("in lrs4032 cmd Get <- :%i -Chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, *pvalue);
00369 #endif
00370       break;
00371 
00372    case CMD_GET_ALL:
00373       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00374       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00375       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00376       status = lrs4032_get_all(index, channel, pvalue);
00377 #ifdef DEBUG
00378       printf("in lrs4032 cmd get all <-:%i -Chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, *pvalue);
00379 #endif
00380       break;
00381 
00382       /* current measurements not supported in LRS4032 */
00383 
00384    case CMD_GET_CURRENT:
00385       break;
00386 
00387    case CMD_GET_CURRENT_ALL:
00388       break;
00389 
00390    case CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT:
00391       break;
00392 
00393    default:
00394       cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs4032 device driver", "Received unknown command %d", cmd);
00395       status = FE_ERR_DRIVER;
00396       break;
00397    }
00398 
00399    va_end(argptr);
00400 
00401    return status;
00402 }
